item.title: 哈佛商业评论•人工智能必读10本书
item.description: 《哈佛商业评论•人工智能必读10本书》 作者：Harvard Business Review 出版社：Ascent Audio 主题领域：Artificial Intelligence (AI) 内容简介 · · · · · · The next generation of AI is here - use it to lead your business forward.

item.title: 中国人工智能进步加速，正缩小与美国差距
item.description: China Is Closing the A.I. Gap With the United States MEAGHAN TOBIN, CADE METZ At the World Artificial Intelligence Conference in Shanghai this month, start-up founder Qu Dongqi showed off a video he had recently posted online.
